oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A.F.A. Convention - Safari, 1977
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: N/A, N/A
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 3rd Annual National A. F .A. Convention SEPTEMBER 23, 24, 25, 1977 Safari Hotel - Scottsdale, ArizonaEnclosed shopping area I Holiday and Motel 6 nearby, within walking distance.Tentative ScheduleFri., Sept. 23 - Commercial Displays open noon. Cocktail Party - evening.Sat., Sept. 24 - Outstanding speakers throughout day. Cocktail Party,banquet, awards - evening.Sun., Sept. 25 - All day tour to visit 3 locations: Phoenix Zoo, BernardRoer's Collection, and Mickey Ollson Farms (2 locations).HOTEL RATES - $20.00 single room per night $24.00 Double room per nightTICKET COST - $35.00 per person - to attend for three days - which includes lectures, the Sunday Bus Tour, and four meals (2 lunches - 1 Saturday, and 1 Sunday, 1 Banquet on Saturday night, 1 Breakfast on Sunday).PLAN TO ATTENDIf you're interested in birds - you can't buy a more entertaining,exciting, educational weekend.Watch next issue of Watchbird for more details and pre-registration form.Â
